qas.question: What is a major hurdle of the financial aspect of an NPO?
How is resource mismanagement allowed to happen so easily?

answers.text: employees are not accountable to anybody with a direct stake in the organization

qas.question: How can an NPO help to prevent financial problems?
What can constitute accounting fraud when nothing is recorded?

answers.text: Liabilities promised on the full faith and credit of the organization

qas.question: What can a large influx of money from a for-profit company do to an organization?

plausible_answers.text: the employees are not accountable to anybody with a direct stake in the organization

qas.question: Why is making employees happy a problem with NPO's?
What can an employee do with the organization's reputation without disclosing donors?

plausible_answers.text: improving the NPO's reputation, making other employees happy, and attracting new donors

qas.question: What are three ways a commentator is rewarded?
How can a for-profit organization prevent financial problems?
What can large corporations attracting donors do to a NPO?

context: <a0_0> Quản lý tài nguyên sai <a0_0/> là một vấn đề đặc biệt với NPO vì <b5_0> các <a1_0> nhân viên không chịu trách nhiệm với bất kỳ ai có cổ phần trực tiếp trong tổ chức <b5_0/><a1_0/> .
